p.seg: Tri hollamain Chondacht .i. mac Liacc &ersir; mac Coisi &ersir; Fland mac Lonain .i. mac De &ersir; mac duine &ersir; mac deamain.
Fland mac Lonain, mac deamain side ara geri &ersir; ara duilgi, uair ni deachaid a tig riam cen easba aire do denum cen esba aíre do dénum and.
Mac Liac imorro mac duine ar febas a thigidis &ersir; ara febus arai in duine fen.
Mac Cosi imorro mac De ar met a derci &ersir; is bas ailithri ruc.
llrechtach imorro ainm timpanaich meic Liac &ersir; timpanach meic Lonain roime he &ersir; dobai ac mac Liac iar n-ec meic Lonain.
Dochuaid mac Liac do indsaigid Briain dia acallaim &ersir; Illrechtach mailli fris.
IS amlaid notheighed co menic o loch Riach tar Echtgi fodeas co Luimneach ocus da puitric dec lais con a mbiad dingbala leo.
Uair is da radarc dec atat a n-Echtgi &ersir; puitric noibead in cach radarc dibsin.
Feacht and tra dochuadar fodeas &ersir; rosuidsedar i n-aroile cnuc inti .i. ceann Crochain &ersir; adbert mac Liag:
Is imda cnoc &ersir; loch &ersir; dingna &ersir; robad fis mor a fis uili.
Albert Ilrachtach: damad he mac Lonain nobeith sunn nobiad aici a fis dinds.eanchais cach inaid sund.
Adbert mac Liag: Gabair sut &ersir; crochair he.

Rochunnig Ilrechtach dal co maidin &ersir; tucad do can a chrochad, &ersir; rothraisc an aidchi sin co toracht anum Floind meic Lonain dia chobair. o drechtadar madan moch iarnabarach, adchonncadar chucu mac Lonan &ersir; adbert riu:
Leigid uaib in cimid &ersir; indisfead duib seanchas cach dingna sunna isin nEchtgi.
Rosaerad amlaid sen in timpanach cen a chrochad ac mac Liag &ersir; adbert mac Lonan and sin in duan-sa and.
